matter_of_fact: A hidden passage lies beneath the village well.
The mayor keeps an ancient compass in their office.
A forgotten diary speaks of a lost civilization.
The blacksmith's hammer is enchanted with a protective spell.
The old oak tree marks the entrance to a secret cavern.
An eerie glow can be seen in the forest at midnight.
The clock tower strikes thirteen at random intervals.
A rare flower blooms only during a full moon in the meadow.
A cursed amulet was buried near the abandoned mill.
The baker knows a recipe for eternal youth.
story: A hidden passage lies beneath the village well. The mayor keeps an ancient compass in their office that points to the secret cavern marked by the old oak tree. A forgotten diary reveals that a protective spell was cast on the blacksmith's hammer to guard the entrance. At midnight, an eerie glow leads adventurers through the forest to find the enchanted hammer. Along the way, a rare flower blooming during the full moon offers clues to the cavern's treasures.
secrets: The clock tower strikes thirteen at random intervals.

The baker knows a recipe for eternal youth.

agents.name: Mysterious Stranger
agents.backstory: A shadowy figure who appeared in the village one fateful night, claiming to have lost their memory. They carry a map with cryptic markings and seem to know more about the village’s secrets than they let on.

agents.name: Old Sage
agents.backstory: The wise yet enigmatic elder of Eldoria, the Old Sage has seen the rise and fall of the village’s fortunes. Their cryptic advice often holds the key to unlocking long-forgotten truths.

agents.name: Village Child
agents.backstory: A curious and adventurous youngster who knows every nook and cranny of the village. Despite their innocent demeanor, they often stumble upon clues to the village's mysteries.

agents.name: Reclusive Blacksmith
agents.backstory: Once a celebrated artisan, the Blacksmith now lives in isolation, haunted by the disappearance of their family. Their enchanted hammer is rumored to protect the secrets they refuse to share.
